title: Entire team disconnecting?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: takes me like 10mins to even connect to the game after trying like 20 times and im on 50ping but getting strange lag which makes no sense and i just watch my team eventually all disconnect and reconnect and disconnect and then it was just 2 v 5  and i still am getting lag on 50ping but the other team are all connected.... i dont know why i cant connect sometimes when my internet is working just makes no sense your servers are broken

replies.body:
Hey there,

You say your ping is low, but you're getting "strange lag".

Sounds to me like the most probable cause is high [packet loss](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq6) and/or [packet buffering](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq7).

Could you please run the test on [netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) for me and link the results here.

* Click on Start Analysis
* Wait until the analysis completes. This may take several minutes.
* Once the final result is displayed, copy the URL and reply with it in a post here.

Could you also download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/) and run a trace to the following IP (Allow this to run for 5-20 minutes)
>103.240.227.5

Export the results and post them here or upload them to [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) and reply with the link.
